title: Sorting Algorithm Visualizer

title: xkcd comic app
shortDescription: Mobile app made with Xamarin forms that fetches random xkcd-comics and lets you save your favorites.
longDescription: Long An mobile app that lets you view and save your favorite xkcd commics

title: Startpage
